did.abstract: Zenna L. Serrurier (b.1906) was a counselor at Edison Junior High School (later renamed Ramona High School), and later, served as principal of Ramona High School (1948-62). The collection consists of manuscripts, clippings, photographs, correspondence, high school yearbooks, and memorabilia related to Serrurier's career as an educator and principal at Ramona High School.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Serrurier was born in 1906; her family came to the U.S. when she was a child; she taught in Los Angeles, California, and was a counselor at Edison Junior High School (later renamed Ramona High School); principal of Ramona High School, 1948-62.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of manuscripts, clippings, photographs, correspondence, high school yearbooks, and memorabilia related to Serrurier's career as an educator and principal at Ramona High School.
